statements: SELECT id, audio_data, sample_rate, channel_count, duration FROM audio_waveform_data;
SELECT sample_rate, duration, channel_count, audio_data, id FROM audio_waveform_data;
SELECT channel_count, id, duration, audio_data, sample_rate FROM audio_waveform_data;
SELECT duration, sample_rate, audio_data, channel_count, id FROM audio_waveform_data;
SELECT audio_data, channel_count, sample_rate, duration, id FROM audio_waveform_data;
SELECT id, sample_rate, duration FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE sample_rate > 44100 AND duration < 60 ORDER BY duration ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE channel_count = 2 ORDER BY sample_rate DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, sample_rate, duration FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE channel_count = 2 AND duration > 120 ORDER BY sample_rate LIMIT 5
SELECT id, duration, channel_count FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE sample_rate BETWEEN 22050 AND 44100 ORDER BY duration DESC
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE sample_rate = 48000 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data;
SELECT id, waveform_data FROM audio_waveform_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, waveform_data FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, waveform_data FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE waveform_data IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM speech_recognition_models ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, waveform_data FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_accuracy FROM speech_recognition_models WHERE model_accuracy > 0.9 ORDER BY model_accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data JOIN speech_recognition_models ON audio_waveform_data.id = speech_recognition_models.model_id;
SELECT model_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM speech_recognition_models GROUP BY model_name HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data
SELECT id, duration FROM audio_waveform_data ORDER BY duration DESC
SELECT transcript FROM training_data WHERE data_id = 1
SELECT * FROM model_parameters WHERE model_id = 10
SELECT id, sample_rate FROM audio_waveform_data ORDER BY id
SELECT id, waveform, duration, sample_rate FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE duration > 10 ORDER BY sample_rate DESC;
SELECT audio_id, transcript FROM training_data WHERE audio_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND LENGTH(transcript) > 50;
SELECT model_id, parameters FROM model_parameters WHERE JSON_LENGTH(parameters) > 2 ORDER BY parameter_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data JOIN training_data ON audio_waveform_data.id = training_data.audio_id WHERE sample_rate = 44100;
SELECT parameter_id, parameters FROM model_parameters WHERE model_id = 3 ORDER BY parameter_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM AudioFiles;
SELECT file_name, waveform_data FROM AudioFiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, transcription_text FROM Transcriptions WHERE file_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Speakers WHERE speaker_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT SpeakerSpeech.id, speaker_name, file_name FROM SpeakerSpeech INNER JOIN Speakers ON SpeakerSpeech.speaker_id = Speakers.id INNER JOIN AudioFiles ON SpeakerSpeech.audio_file_id = AudioFiles.id;
SELECT * FROM AudioFiles;
SELECT id, file_name FROM AudioFiles ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT file_name, waveform_data FROM AudioFiles WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Transcriptions JOIN AudioFiles ON Transcriptions.file_id = AudioFiles.id;
SELECT speaker_name, transcription_text FROM Speakers JOIN Transcriptions ON Speakers.id = Transcriptions.id WHERE Speakers.id = 1;
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT transcription, waveform_data FROM audio_waveform_data;
SELECT audio_id, feature_vector FROM training_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name FROM speech_models WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT transcription FROM audio_waveform_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT name FROM speech_models WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT * FROM training_data ORDER BY id DESC;
